Description: MACS -- Model-based Analysis of ChIP-Seq

Description: A single molecule sequence assembler for genomes large and small

Description: a lightweight db framework for exploring genetic variation

Name: bowtie2
Description: A fast and sensitive gapped read aligner

Name: vcftools
Description: A set of tools written in Perl and C for working with VCF files such as those generated by the 1000 Genomes Project

Name: sga
Description: de novo sequence assembler using string graphs

Name: velvet
Description: Short read de novo assembler using de Bruijn graphs

Name: bcftools
Description: This is the official development repository for BCFtools To compile the develop branch of htslib is needed git clone --branchdevelop git//githubcom/samtools/htslibgit htslib

Name: hisat2
Description: Graph-based alignment Hierarchical Graph FM index

Name: vcfanno
Description: annotate a VCF with other VCFs/BEDs/tabixed files

Name: giggle
Description: Interval data structure

Name: lumpy-sv
Description: lumpy a general probabilistic framework for structural variant discovery

Name: Basset
Description: Convolutional neural network analysis for predicting DNA sequence activity

Name: abyss
Description: microscope Assemble large genomes using short reads

Name: ldsc
Description: LD Score Regression LDSC

Name: mothur
Description: Welcome to the mothur project initiated by Dr Patrick Schloss and his software development team in the Department of Microbiology & Immunology at The University of Michigan This project seeks to develop a single piece of open-source expandable software to fill the bioinformatics needs of the microbial ecology community

Name: delly
Description: DELLY2 Structural variant discovery by integrated paired-end and split-read analysis

Name: mummer
Description: Mummer alignment tool

Name: qiime2
Description: Official repository for the QIIME 2 framework

Name: HiC-Pro
Description: HiC-Pro An optimized and flexible pipeline for Hi-C data processing

Name: clinvar
Description: This repo provides tools to convert ClinVar data into a tab-delimited flat file and also provides that resulting tab-delimited flat file

Name: DanQ
Description: A hybrid convolutional and recurrent neural network for predicting the function of DNA sequences

Name: ballgown
Description: Bioconductor package ballgown devel version Isoform-level differential expression analysis in R

Name: stringtie
Description: Transcript assembly and quantification for RNA-Seq

Name: scLVM
Description: scLVM is a modelling framework for single-cell RNA-seq data that can be used to dissect the observed heterogeneity into different sources thereby allowing for the correction of confounding sources of variation

Name: CNVnator
Description: a tool for CNV discovery and genotyping from depth-of-coverage by mapped reads

Name: SIMLR
Description: Implementations in both Matlab and R of the SIMLR method The manuscript of the method is available at https//wwwnaturecom/articles/nmeth4207

Name: Artemis
Description: Artemis is a free genome viewer and annotation tool that allows visualization of sequence features and the results of analyses within the context of the sequence and its six-frame translation

Name: MAST
Description: Tools and methods for analysis of single cell assay data in R

Name: svtyper
Description: Bayesian genotyper for structural variants

Name: ZIFA
Description: Zero-inflated dimensionality reduction algorithm for single-cell data

Name: htseq
Description: HTSeq is a Python library to facilitate processing and analysis of data from  high-throughput sequencing HTS experiments

Name: sciclone
Description: An R package for inferring the subclonal architecture of tumors

Name: deconstructSigs
Description: deconstructSigs

Name: circlator
Description: A tool to circularize genome assemblies

Name: methylKit
Description: R package for DNA methylation analysis

Name: clonevol
Description: Inferring and visualizing clonal evolution in multi-sample cancer sequencing

Name: PhenoGraph
Description: Subpopulation detection in high-dimensional single-cell data

Name: weblogo
Description: WebLogo 3 Sequence Logos redrawn

Name: TADbit
Description: TADbit is a complete Python library to deal with all steps to analyze model and explore 3C-based data With TADbit the user can map FASTQ files to obtain raw interaction binned matrices Hi-C like matrices normalize and correct interaction matrices identify and compare the so-called Topologically Associating Domains TADs build 3D models from the interaction matrices and finally extract structural properties from the models TADbit is complemented by TADkit for visualizing 3D models
